titleStmt.title: Remarks of an university-man upon a late book, falsly called A vindication of the primitive fathers, against the imputations of Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum, written by Mr. Hill of Killmington
titleStmt.author: Willes, John, 1646 or 7-1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to John Willes. cf. NUC pre-1956.
